data.text: @LFPress If you have to put “of God” at the end of your church’s name, it’s probably not.

@JohnTak1253 @torontocrockett @LFPress The "bask contentedly in ignorance" part was not directed at you. It was directed at the person who responded to me by saying "so what" and that legal education clearly doesn't mean much. (TorontoCrockett, I think.)

@CanadRaf @torontocrockett @LFPress At no point did I say you didn’t understand the judge’s reasoning. I said I’ll defer to the judge’s opinion. And in fact, I said I respected your academic achievements. You unfortunately defaulted to name calling: asshole, ignorant.

@JohnTak1253 @torontocrockett @LFPress I hit back. My legal knowledge is constantly belittled, insulted and ignored on Twitter and I won't stand for it. Section 1 knowledge is going to be increasingly important given RWNJ assertions like the ones from FluTruxKlan.
@JohnTak1253 @torontocrockett @LFPress I read the judgment. You began with the rudeness by saying I didn't understand the judge's reasoning.
